title: (x) "Colt 45" liquor logo - similar to Century & Latin {Stephen}
content:
Looking for the font of the Colt 45 logo or something very similar as only a small range of type is needed. Particularily interested in an identical "t" if nothing else.

[http://40ouncebeer.com/pics40/colt45labelveryold.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20111219044452/http:/40ouncebeer.com/pics40/colt45labelveryold.jpg "http://40ouncebeer.com/pics40/colt45labelveryold.jpg")

Any help is appreciated. Thanks!
author: Anastasia Beave...
